main event: A witness observed a bright silver object moving across the sky in Cleveland, Ohio, on December 7, 1958.
interesting points: The object made a 30-foot turn during its movement., The object was estimated to be about 25 feet in size., Previous sightings by the witness indicated familiarity with such phenomena., The sighting duration was approximately 3-4 minutes., The date of the report coincides with a period of multiple UFO sightings documented in Project Blue Book.
sighted object: a bright silver object in the sky
witness description: The witness is described as a private citizen from Cleveland with previous sightings.
